item.title: üèåÔ∏è Binary golfing - Introduction
item.description: So tmp.out - once again - got me. Especially netspooky, wich wrote about golfing binaries. Instantly I was caught in golfing. Binary golfing? Crafting the smallest binary which does a particular task. Why someone would do this? Learn about binary executables and format parsers Flex on muggles My notes on ELF format It is recommanded to code in assembly in order to manage your headers as you wish.

item.description: The first part of my series on low-level learning journey, sit back, relax and enjoy me struggling for basic stuff.
